title: ELOL Utility AI System
description: Manage and define what NPCs do, by using the Utility AI System with custom actions and considerations.
longDescription:
Manage and define what NPCs do, by using this Utility AI System with custom actions and considerations.


Some useful links:

Documentation

Tutorial Videos


Who is this for?

This is for you if you need the following:

·       A simple AI solution where you can craft AI actions and considerations using blueprint.

·       A solution using all standard unreal features.

·       A framework that should complement your development journey.


About:

This product allows you to simply focus on your NPCs actions and considerations. It takes away the heavy learning curve and frustration of managing complex behaviors trees and tasks.

You create actions and associated considerations. The AI takes the actions, considers it and executes the action with the best score.


This solution is made to be as portable as possible using only blueprints.


Please Note: The solution does not come with any standard actions and consideration. It provides a base for you whereby you can create your own. Please see the Tutorial Videos on how this is done.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Minimal AIController and NPC Setup.
  • 100% Blueprint based Utility AI System.
  • Ability to create a Consideration and score it.
  • Ability to create Actions based on consideration scores.
  • Behavior Tree to calculate and perform the best NPC action.


Number of Blueprints and Objects: 17

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: No (Not Tested)


Additional Requirements:

·       AISupport Plugin


Documentation: Technical Documentation

How-to Videos: Tutorial Videos


Important/Additional Notes: Some learning is required to understand the concept behind utility AI. Please watch the how-to video series created for this solution.
